contents:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree vacated for the reasons noted in Righter v. Righter, 442 Pa. 428, 275 A. 2d 4 (1971), announced this same date. Each party to pay own costs. The matter is transferred to the Orphans’ Court Division of the Court , of Common Pleas of Philadelphia.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
